column4: why my sound card works when I modprobe it but not automatically?
just add it to /etc/modprobe and it will modprobe it on start ;)  (it might be modprobe.conf i dont remember)
actually it's /etc/modprobe.d and it's a directory o_O
what is modprobe's file syntax? i don;t get it
unless your talking about the /etc/modprobe file, you just will put the name of the module (if modprobe snd-hda-intel you put snd-hda-intel)
